title: Need for ranked memory
summary: Observation shows memories (insights, backlog items) must be ranked by fundamentality and enabling power to prioritize future work coherently.
signals: Scaling repo complexity makes ad hoc recall unreliable; ranking ensures high-leverage work rises first.
actions: Implement backlog ranking (plan 2025-09-25-backlog-hygiene) and extend reflections/insights with priority metadata.
notes: Memories without ranking become noise. Capture layer (L0-L6), Unity→Meaning score, and impact_score so development order compounds.
